sentences.chinese: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

sentences.english: Police are still investigating the exact cause of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 警方还在调查这起事故的确切原因。

sentences.english: What were his exact words?
sentences.chinese: 他的原话是什么？

sentences.chinese: 对时机的把握必须精确。

sentences.english: Some concepts in Chinese medicine have no exact equivalent in Western medicine.

sentences.english: The device most often used to do this is a load balancer, which is an appliance that accepts requests from the outside world and hands them off to the next available application server.
sentences.chinese: 进行这一操作最常用的设备是一个负载均衡器，这是一个从外部接收请求并将它们移交给下一个可用应用程序服务器的装置。

sentences.chinese: 为期一周的英语强化课程

sentences.chinese: 紧张谈判的一天

sentences.chinese: 食物过敏

sentences.english: Our youngest daughter is a vegetarian.

sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

sentences.chinese: 这个小架子，就是我老家起居室的全部装饰了。 除此之外，墙上和任何东西上都是干干净净的。

sentences.english: Park said that although he'd only had the plastic tree for two years, he felt it was like "his best friend" and never got tired of seeing it sitting in his living room.
sentences.chinese: 帕克先生说，尽管他和这颗塑胶圣诞树在一起生活才两年时间，但是它就像是“一个最好的朋友”一样。 每天它都立在起居室�，帕克从未厌倦它。

sentences.chinese: 水是从浴室中溢出来的。

sentences.chinese: 她打开了床头灯。

detailed_translations.english: an object that produces light by using electricity, oil, or gas

sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

a set of questions that you ask a large number of people in order to find out about their opinions or behaviour

sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

sentences.chinese: 当地医院

sentences.chinese: 本地居民

sentences.chinese: 局部感染

sentences.chinese: 大楼里上上下下都铺了地毯。

heavy woven material for covering floors or stairs, or a piece of this material

sentences.chinese: 她星期四在工作。

sentences.chinese: 钢铁工业

sentences.chinese: 安装了大铁门的私家车道

sentences.english: the absorption of iron from food
sentences.chinese: 对食物中铁的吸收

sentences.english: ...a man of icy nerve and iron will.
sentences.chinese: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

sentences.chinese: 一个伦敦郊区

sentences.english: The exterior walls need a new coat of paint.
sentences.chinese: 外墙需要刷新漆了。

detailed_translations.english: on the outside of something

sentences.english: I’ve worked with children in various settings, mainly in secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 我在许多地方教过孩子，主要是在中学。

sentences.english: The heating system was already on its highest setting.
sentences.chinese: 取暖系统已经调到了最高挡。

sentences.chinese: 婚礼

sentences.chinese: 奥运会开幕式

sentences.english: The queen was crowned with due ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 女王按照规定的礼仪加冕。

sentences.chinese: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

sentences.chinese: 当前消费者喜欢购买优质产品的趋向

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

detailed_translations.chinese: 应用，实施，使用；适用；申请，请求

to put or spread something such as paint, liquid, or medicine onto a surface

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

sentences.english: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

sentences.english: The school trip has become an annual event.
sentences.chinese: 学校组织的旅行成了一年一度的活动。

detailed_translations.english: a plant that lives for one year or season

sentences.chinese: 中士叫斯威夫特守着入口。

sentences.chinese: 守护着幼狮的母狮

sentences.english: There were two security guards on duty outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼外面有两名保安在值勤。

detailed_translations.english: to protect a person, place, or object by staying near them and watching them

sentences.chinese: 一队志愿者正在张贴海报。

sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

sentences.english: the television lounge
sentences.chinese: 电视放映室

detailed_translations.english: a public room in a hotel or other building, that is used by many people as a place to relax

sentences.english: First-year students may elect  French, Spanish, or German.
sentences.chinese: 一年级学生可选修法语、西班牙语或德语。

sentences.english: The English and the Spanish were among the first to colonize North America.
sentences.chinese: 英国人和西班牙人是首先向北美洲开拓殖民地的。

sentences.english: At his lordship's death in the Spanish campaign in the year 1811,his estate fell in to the family of the Tiptoffs.
sentences.chinese: 这位爵爷在1811年西班牙战役中死亡后，他的产业归蒂普托夫家族支配。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Spain, its people, or its language

sentences.english: I do yoga twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 我一周做两次瑜伽。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑜珈（意为“结合”，指修行）；瑜珈术
detailed_translations.english: a system of exercises that help you control your mind and body in order to relax

sentences.english: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.chinese: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in your head

sentences.english: Burglars broke into their home.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

sentences.english: a goods train
sentences.chinese: 一列货车

sentences.english: the large market for consumer goods
sentences.chinese: 庞大的消费品市场

sentences.english: Britain’s leading exporter of manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 英国主要的工业制成品出口商

sentences.english: There will be tax increases on a range of goods and services .
sentences.chinese: 有一些商品和服务将要增税。

detailed_translations.english: things which are carried by road, train etc
